Translations.Text: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise
Most surely in the heavens and the earth there are signs for the believers
And in your own creation and in what He spreads abroad of animals there are signs for a people that have faith

And in the variation of the night and the day, and in the sustenance Allah sends down from the clouds, then gives life thereby to the earth after its death, and in the changing of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand
These are the Signs of Allah which We recite to you with Truth; then in what explanations would they believe after (rejecting) Allah and His Signs
Woe to every sinful dealer in falsehood
Who hears the Signs of Allah recited to him, then persists proudly as though he had not heard them; so announce to him a grievous punishment
And when he comes to know of any of Our revelations, he takes it for a jest; these it is that shall have abasing doom
Before them is Hell, and there shall not avail them aught of what they earned, nor those whom they took for guardians besides Allah, and they shall have an awful doom
This is guidance; and as for those who disbelieve in the revelations of their Lord, they shall have a painful penalty because of their abominations
It is Allah Who has made subservient to you the sea that the ships may run therein by His command, and that you may seek of His grace, and that you may give thanks
And He has subjected to you whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth, all from Himself; most surely there are signs in this for a people who reflect
